name: 4 Colours
summary: Colour the "globe" and respect one basic rule: neighbouring areas should have different colours.

name: 4 Civilizations
summary: Four Civilisations is an indie game. It brings you back to early civilization times and lets you control the destiny of your civilization. You will compete with 3 other civilizations in the game. You will need to gather resources to advance in science and upgrade your buildings.
